code: import React from'react';import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var App=function App(){var sendData=function sendData(e){e.preventDefault();var data={name:document.getElementById("moviename").value,year:document.getElementById("year").value,genre:document.getElementById("genre").value};console.log(data);axios.post("http://localhost:9000/",data).then(function(res){console.log("data sent");}).catch(function(e){console.log("error");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{style:{marginTop:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"movie name",id:"moviename"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"year",id:"year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"genre",id:"genre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",id:"submit",onClick:function onClick(e){return sendData(e);},children:"submit"})]})});};export default App;
